downloadDescription: These resources can help you learn about SharePoint hybrid scenarios and about how to configure your environment.
detailsSection:
The SharePoint 2013 Business Connectivity Services Hybrid Model (spc-2013-bcs-hybrid-model) illustrates the flow of data and authentication in a BCS Hybrid environment. Additional information about hybrid deployments is available in the TechNet library.
  • Display hybrid search results in SharePoint Server 2013 describes how to configure search in a hybrid SharePoint environment so that users can get search results in SharePoint Server 2013 from the SharePoint Server 2013 and SharePoint Online search indexes.
  • Display hybrid search results in SharePoint Online describes how to configure search in a hybrid SharePoint environment so that users can get search results in SharePoint Online from the SharePoint Server 2013 and SharePoint Online search indexes.
  • Deploy a Business Connectivity Services hybrid solution in SharePoint 2013 describes how to configure the Business Connectivity Services hybrid scenario to access on-premises data through SharePoint Online.
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Visio 2010, Microsoft Visio 2013, Adobe Portable Document File Reader
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
